Metadata.title: Gilam Market - Premium Carpets in Uzbekistan
Metadata.description: Buy premium quality Turkish, Iranian, and Uzbek carpets at Gilam Market. Wide range of sizes, modern and classic designs with delivery across Uzbekistan.
Metadata.ogTitle: Gilam Market - Premium Carpets & Rugs Online
Metadata.ogDescription: Discover the best collection of carpets in Uzbekistan. Turkish, Iranian, and local designs available for online purchase with home delivery.

About.title: About Us - Gilam Market
About.description: Learn more about Gilam Market, the leading provider of premium carpets in Uzbekistan. We offer a wide selection of Turkish, Iranian, and Uzbek rugs.

Delivery.title: Delivery Information - Gilam Market
Delivery.description: Fast and reliable carpet delivery across Uzbekistan. Check our delivery terms and conditions.
